item.title: Co-Parenting with a Chronic Projector: Understanding the Behavior and Protecting Your Child
item.description: Projection in co-parenting is more than blame-shifting—it’s a psychological defense mechanism with real consequences for both parents and children. Learn how to identify it, protect yourself, and support your child.
